content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences with the correct words.
content.main_text: Dear Sarah, I hope you are having a great week! I wanted to tell you about my new job. It is really ___ and I enjoy it a lot.
content.explanation:
(1) La palabra 'exciting' se usa para describir algo que causa emoción o interés.
(2) La palabra 'share' significa dar a conocer algo a otra persona, en este caso, experiencias.
(3) La palabra 'meeting' se refiere a un encuentro o cita entre personas.
(4) La palabra 'happy' se usa para describir un estado emocional positivo.
(5) La frase 'so much' enfatiza el sentimiento de extrañar a alguien de manera significativa.

content.prompt_es: Fill in the blanks with the correct words to express your opinion.
content.main_text:
When discussing a topic, it's important to express your views clearly. Here are some sentences where you can practice expressing opinions.

1. I believe that ___ is the best way to solve this problem.
2. In my opinion, the government should ___ more resources for education.
3. Some people think that technology is harmful, but I ___ that it can improve our lives.
4. I tend to agree with those who say that ___ is essential for success.
5. A common argument against this idea is that ___ can lead to misunderstandings.
content.explanation:
(1) La colaboración implica trabajar juntos para resolver problemas.
(2) Asignar recursos es necesario para mejorar la educación.
(3) Argumentar significa presentar razones para apoyar un punto de vista.
(4) La perseverancia es clave para alcanzar objetivos.
(5) La ambigüedad puede causar confusión en la comunicación.
